amendatorysection.catchline: Barber school or college; cosmetologists; barbers; course hours; credit.
amendatorysection.para: (1) Cosmetologists licensed in the State of Nebraska attending a barber school or college may be given credit of one thousand hours of training applied toward the course hours required for graduation.
(2) Barbers licensed in the State of Nebraska attending a school of cosmetology may be given credit of one thousand hours of training applied toward the course hours required for graduation.
